local EventManager = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function EventManager:initialize()

end

--添加事件
function EventManager:AddEvent(key,callBack)
    CS.LC.AddEvent(self,key,callBack);
end
--SendEvent事件
function EventManager:SendEvent(key,para,p2,p3,p4)
    CS.LC.SendEvent(key,para,p2,p3,p4);
end
--移除事件
function EventManager:RemoveEvent(key,callBack)
    CS.LC.RemoveEvent(self,key,callBack);
end

return EventManager
